channel.title: Milestones & Due Dates on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Milestones & Due Dates on JavaScript

item.title: Submit Project Ideas
item.description: Milestone I: Submit Project Ideas Submit three (3) ideas for your final project Deliverable: Use this form to submit your final project ideas Due Date: Tuesday, September 3rd After which, I’ll schedule some time to meet with you to discuss your ideas

item.title: Get Idea Approved
item.description: Milestone II: Get Final Project Idea Approved Due Date: Thursday, September 5th After meeting with the instructor and discussing your idea, you’ll formally decide what you want to build

item.title: Create Github Repository for Final Project
item.description: Milestone III: Create Github Repository for Final Project Create a github repository for your final project, clone the project down to your ‘github’ folder on your laptop Submit a link to your final project’s github repository Here’s an example of what link should look like: https://github.com/kareemgrant/kg-awesome-game Due Date: Thursday, September 5th Deliverable: Use this form to submit your repository url Do not include spaces in your github repository names

item.title: Create & Submit Wireframes
item.description: Milestone IV: Create and Submit Wireframes Due Date: Tuesday, September 10th Create wireframes for each page layout (assuming you have multiple pages with different layouts) of your final project Instructions The following assumes you have already created a github repository for your final project and cloned the project down to your ‘github’ folder on your laptop (see Milestone II) Add a new folder to your project files/folders for final project (created in Milestone II) called wireframes

item.title: Create Project Plan
item.description: Milestone V: Create Project Plan Due Date: Tuesday, September 16th Work with the instructor team to break up your final project into a series of steps that you’ll turn into tasks Details: TBD Trello is a free project management tool that uses the kanban approach to track tasks --

item.title: Host Final Project
item.description: Milestone VI: Host Final Project Details TBD Due Date: Thursday, September 26th

item.title: Submit Final Project
item.description: Milestone VII: Submit Final Project Details TBD Due Date: Tuesday, Oct 1st
